actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provision in the Balanced Budget Act of 1997 relating to base periods for Federal unemployment tax purposes.

summary.text: Repeals a provision of the Balanced Budget Act of 1997 (Public Law 105-33) relating to base periods for Federal unemployment tax purposes (which provided that State definitions of such base periods may not be considered as meeting the requirement for a method of administration reasonably calculated to insure full payment of unemployment compensation when due).

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision in the Balanced Budget Act of 1997 relating to base periods for Federal unemployment tax purposes.
